trans-unit.source: Here you can add a headline to the module.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti agiuntar in titel al modul.

trans-unit.source: Please choose the type of module.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner il tip da modul.

trans-unit.source: Enter a value greater than 0 to show only submenu items.
trans-unit.target: Endatescha ina valur pli gronda che 0 per be mussar sutpuncts dal menu.

trans-unit.source: Enter a value greater than 0 to limit the nesting level of the menu.
trans-unit.target: Endatescha ina valur pli gronda che 0 per limitar la profunditad dal menu

trans-unit.source: Never show any menu items beyond the stop level.
trans-unit.target: Mai mussar puncts da menu sur la limita.

trans-unit.source: Show items that are usually only visible to authenticated users.
trans-unit.target: Mussar elements ch'èn normalmain be visibels per utilisaders autentifitgads.

trans-unit.source: Define a custom source or target page for the module.
trans-unit.target: Definescha ina pagina da funtauna u destinaziun per il modul.

trans-unit.source: Please choose the reference page from the site structure.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna la pagina da referenza ord la structura da la pagina.

trans-unit.source: Here you can select the navigation template.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner il template da navigaziun.

trans-unit.source: Here you can overwrite the default module template.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti midar il template da standard dal modul.

trans-unit.source: Please choose one or more pages from the site structure.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna ina u pliras paginas da la structura da pagina.

trans-unit.source: Show items that are usually hidden in the navigation menu.
trans-unit.target: Mussar ils elements ch'èn per ordinari zuppentads en il menu.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a custom label for the drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti inditgar ina denominaziun individuala per il menu drop-down.

trans-unit.source: Allow members to log into the front end automatically.
trans-unit.target: Lubir a commembers da s'annunziar automaticamain en il front-end.

trans-unit.source: Please choose the page to which visitors will be redirected when clicking a link or submitting a form.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna la pagina a la quala ils visitaders duain vegnir renviads sch'els cliccan ina colliaziun u tramettan in formular.
Renviar a la pagina visitada l'ultim

trans-unit.source: Redirect the user back to the last page visited instead of the redirect page.
trans-unit.target: Renviar l'utilisader a l'ultima pagina visitada enstagl a la pagina da renviar.

trans-unit.source: Please choose the number of columns of the form.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna il dumber da colonnas dal formular.

trans-unit.source: Show the label above the input field.
trans-unit.target: Mussar il num sur il champ d'endataziun.

trans-unit.source: Show the label on the left side of the input field.
trans-unit.target: Mussar il num sanester dal champ d'endataziun.

trans-unit.source: Show these fields in the front end form.
trans-unit.target: Mussar quests champs en il formular dal front-end.

trans-unit.source: Here you can select the form template.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner il template.

trans-unit.source: Render the form without HTML tables.
trans-unit.target: Crear il formular senza tabellas da HTML.

trans-unit.source: Please select the default query type.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna il tip da dumonda da standard

trans-unit.source: Returns only pages that contain all keywords.
trans-unit.target: Chatta be paginas che cuntegna tut ils chavazzins.

trans-unit.source: Returns all pages that contain any of the keywords.
trans-unit.target: Returnar tut las paginas che cuntegnan almain in pled.

trans-unit.source: Will find "Contao" if you search for "con" (equal to a wildcard search).
trans-unit.target: Chatta era 'Contao' sche ti tschertgas 'con' (correspunda al tschertgar cun in tegnaplazza).

trans-unit.source: Contains a single input field only.
Contains an input field and a radio button menu to choose the query type.
trans-unit.target: Cuntegna in champ d'endataziun ed in menu da buttuns radio per tscherner il tip da dumonda.

trans-unit.source: The number of characters on the left and right side of each keyword that are used as context.
trans-unit.target: Quai è il dumber da caracters avant e suenter mintga chavazzin che vegnan utilisads sco context.

trans-unit.source: Here you can limit the overall context length per result.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti limitar la lunghezza cumpletta dal context per resultat.

trans-unit.source: The number of items per page. Set to 0 to disable pagination.
trans-unit.target: Il dumber dad elements per pagina. Scriva 0 per betg crear paginas.

trans-unit.source: Here you can select the search form layout.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner il layout dal formular da tschertgar.

trans-unit.source: Here you can select the search results template.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir in template per ils resultats da la tschertga.

trans-unit.source: Please choose the column whose articles you want to list.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna las colonnas ord las qualas ti vuls enumerar ils artitgels.

trans-unit.source: Here you can define how many items will be skipped.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir quants elements che duain vegnir ignorads.

trans-unit.source: Automatically redirect to the first item if none is selected.
trans-unit.target: Renviar automaticamain a l'emprim element sche nagin è tschernì.

trans-unit.source: Please enter the width and height in pixel.
trans-unit.target: Endatescha la ladezza e la autezza en pixels.

trans-unit.source: Make the Flash movie transparent (wmode = transparent).
trans-unit.target: Far transparent l'animaziun da Flash (wmode = transparent).

trans-unit.source: Pass variables to the Flash movie (var1=value1&var2=value2).
trans-unit.target: Surdar variablas a l'animaziun da Flash (var1=value1&var2=value2).

trans-unit.source: Please enter the required Flash player version (e.g. 6.0.12).
trans-unit.target: Endatescha la versiun dal player da Flash necessaria (p. ex. 6.0.12).

trans-unit.source: The alternate content will be shown if the movie cannot be loaded. HTML tags are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Il cuntegn alternativ vegn mussà sche l'animaziun na po betg vegnir chargiada. Tags da HTML èn lubids.

trans-unit.source: Whether to use a file on the server or point to an external URL.
trans-unit.target: U ina datoteca sin il server ubain utilisar ina URL externa.

trans-unit.source: Please select a file from the files directory.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna ina datoteca da la survista da datotecas.

trans-unit.source: Please enter the URL (http://…) of the Flash movie.
trans-unit.target: Endatescha ina URL (http://…) da l'animaziun da Flash.

trans-unit.source: Make the Flash movie interact with the browser (requires JavaScript).
trans-unit.target: Far che l'animaziun da Flash interagescha cun il navigatur (basegna JavaScript).

trans-unit.source: Please enter a unique Flash movie ID.
trans-unit.target: Endatescha ina ID unica per l'animaziun da Flash

trans-unit.source: Open the full-size image in a lightbox or the link in a new browser window.
trans-unit.target: Avrir il maletg en grondezza originala en ina lightbox u avrir la colliaziun en ina nova fanestra.

trans-unit.source: Here you can set the image dimensions and the resize mode.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir las dimensiuns ed il modus da redimensiunar.

trans-unit.source: Display the image name or caption below the image.
trans-unit.target: Mussar il num da maletg u la legenda sut il maletg.

trans-unit.source: Please select one or more files from the files directory.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna ina u pliras datotecas da l'ordinatur da datotecas.

trans-unit.source: The sort order of the items.
trans-unit.target: La successiun da zavrar dals elements.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the list of allowed HTML tags in the back end settings.
trans-unit.target: Ti pos modifitgar la glista dals tags da HTML lubids en la configuraziun dal back-end.

trans-unit.source: Here you can define how long the RSS feed is being cached.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus definir il temp durant il qual il feed da RSS duai vegnir memorisà en il cache.

trans-unit.source: Please enter the URL of one or more RSS feeds.
trans-unit.target: Endatai la URL dad in u plirs feeds da RSS.

trans-unit.source: Here you can select the feed template.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus tscherner il template per il feed.

trans-unit.source: Here you can limit the number of items. Set to 0 to show all.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti limitar il dumber dad elements. 0 munta mussar tuts.

trans-unit.source: Show the module to certain member groups only.
trans-unit.target: Be mussar il modul a tschertas gruppas da commembers.

trans-unit.source: These groups will be able to see the module.
trans-unit.target: Questas gruppas vegnan ad esser ablas da vesair il modul.

trans-unit.source: Hide the module if a member is logged in.
trans-unit.target: Zuppentar il modul sch'in commember è s'annunzià.

trans-unit.source: Here you can set an ID and one or more classes.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir ina ID ed ina u pliras classas.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the spacing in front of and after the module in pixel. You should try to avoid inline styles and define the spacing in a style sheet, though.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir spazi avant e suenter il modul en pixels. Ti duessas empruvar dad evitar stils integrads e definir il spazi en in style-sheet.

trans-unit.source: Here you can disable the security question (not recommended).
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus deactivar la dumonda da segirezza (betg recumandà).

trans-unit.source: Here you can assign the user to one or more groups.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus agiuntar l'utilisader ad ina u pliras gruppas.

trans-unit.source: Allow the new user to log into the front end.
trans-unit.target: Lubir al nov utilisader da s'annunziar en il front-end.

trans-unit.source: Do not require the username to request a new password.
trans-unit.target: Betg necessari dad inditgar il num d'utilisader per dumandar in nov pled-clav.

trans-unit.source: Here you can define how to handle the deletion.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus definir sco elavurar il stizzar.

trans-unit.source: Create a home directory from the registered username.
trans-unit.target: Crear in ordinatur persunal per il num d'utilisader registrà.

trans-unit.source: Please select the parent folder from the files directory.
trans-unit.target: Tscherni l'ordinatur surordinà ord il register da datotecas.

trans-unit.source: Send an activation e-mail to the registered e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Trametter in e-mail per activar a l'adressa dad e-mail registrada.

trans-unit.source: Please choose the page to which users will be redirected after the request has been completed.
trans-unit.target: Tscherni la pagina a la quala ils utilisaders duain vegnir renviads sche la dumonda è cumpletada.

trans-unit.source: You can use the wildcards ##domain## (domain name), ##link## (activation link) and any input field (e.g. ##lastname##).
trans-unit.target: Vus pudais utilisar ils tegnaplazzas ##domain## (num da la Domain), ##link## (link a la pagina per activar) e tut ils champs d'endataziun (p.ex. ##lastname##).

trans-unit.source: You can use the wildcards ##domain## (domain name), ##link## (activation link) and any user property (e.g. ##lastname##).
trans-unit.target: Vus pudais utilisar ils tegnaplazzas ##domain## (num da la Domain), ##link## (link a la pagina per activar) e tut las caracteristicas da l'utilisader (p.ex. ##lastname##).

trans-unit.source:
Thank you for your registration on ##domain##.
Please click ##link## to complete your registration and to activate your account. If you did not request an account, please ignore this e-mail.
trans-unit.target: Grazia per vossa registraziun sin ##domain##. Cliccai sin ##link## per cumplettar vossa registraziun ed activar voss conto. Sche vus n'avais betg creà quest conto, ignorai per plaschair quest e-mail.
Vossa dumonda per in pled-clav sin %s

trans-unit.source:
You have requested a new password for ##domain##.
Please click ##link## to set the new password. If you did not request this e-mail, please contact the website administrator.
trans-unit.target: Vus avais dumandà per in nov pled-clav sin ##domain##. Cliccai sin ##link## per definir in nov pled-clav. Sche vus n'avais betg dumandà per in nov pled-clav, contactai per plaschair l'administratur da la pagina.

trans-unit.source: Show the details of module ID %s
trans-unit.target: Mussar ils detagls dal modul cun l'ID %s
Encollar suenter il modul cun l'ID %s
